articles.title: Greetings to Megawati Soekarnoputri
articles.content:
Greetings to Megawati Soekarnoputri
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Saturday sent a message of greeting to Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of its foundation.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would develop on good terms in the future, too, and sincerely wished her good health and greater success in her work to develop the party.

articles.title: Spokeswoman for C.C., DWUK Denounces S. Korean Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Spokeswoman for C.C., DWUK Denounces S. Korean Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A spokeswoman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) in a statement on Friday said that the history records lots of crimes stunning the world people, but there were no more cruel and brutal crimes in the world than sexual slavery committed by the Japanese imperialists against Korean women after their occupation of Korea.
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean puppet group conducted humiliating negotiations with Japan in Seoul and committed without any hesitation such shameless acts of treachery as shielding and covering up Japan's hideous sexual slavery.
					
					 This clearly proves that the puppet group is one of the modern day  "five traitors of 1905" as they are little short of the quislings who sold off the country to the Japanese imperialists in the past, bereft of even an iota of national self-respect.
					
					 What is touching off bitterer anger is that such act of insulting all Korean women was openly committed under the administration of woman "president".
					
					 The puppet chief executive is conniving at and patronizing the heinous criminal act of ruthlessly hurting the dignity, human rights and chastity of the women without flickering of an eyelash. It would be recorded in the history as the thrice-cursed pro-Japanese act.
					
					 The so-called "agreement on comfort women" concluded by the south Korean ruling group in collusion with the U.S. and Japan is totally invalid and absolutely intolerable.
					
					 We will surely force Japan to pay for the hideous crimes committed against humanity by force of the dignity and stamina of the strong nation and have the bitter grudge of the Korean women settled.

articles.title: DPRK People Optimistic of Their Final Victory
articles.content:
DPRK People Optimistic of Their Final Victory
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The successful first H-bomb test makes the DPRK people feel thankful to the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for winning another victory in the confrontation with the hostile forces and optimistic of their final victory in it.
					 In this regard, Jo Yong Dok, department director of the DPRK Cabinet, told KCNA:
					
					 The successful H-bomb test conducted pursuant to the strategic determination of the WPK is a momentous event which declared the will of Songun (military-first) Korea to mercilessly wipe aggressors out to the last one if they dared provoke the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK emerged as an advanced nuclear weapons state possessed of even H-bomb.
					
					 This year we would decisively improve the economic planning and guidance to hasten the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Pho Hui Song, manager of the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine, said:
					
					 The successful H-bomb test is a solemn declaration of Songun Korea to firmly defend the dignity of the nation.
					
					 My heart is throbbing with the pride of living in this invincible military giant and the faith in the final victory.
					
					 Keeping this great national pride in minds, we will devote our all to boosting coal production.
					
					 Paek On, management board chairman of the Naejung Co-op Farm in Yomju County, North Phyongan Province, said:
					
					 I am thankful to supreme leader Kim Jong Un for creditably defending the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the region with powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 We, agricultural workers, will work hard to bring about bumper harvest this year with the sense of responsibility that we are in the trench on the first line of the forward echelon of the campaign to defend socialism.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kigwancha Sports Team Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kigwancha Sports Team Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- It has been 60 years since the Kigwancha Sports Team came into being in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The team was formed on January 11, Juche 45 (1956) to represent the railway workers.
					
					 The team won the Order of Kim Il Sung and the Order of National Flag First Class while producing a large number of people's and merited athletes and sports aces.
					
					 Over the past six decades it has obtained many medals, including more than 5,600 golds, and 170-odd trophies in international and national games.
					
					 The team produced aces in football, table tennis, volleyball and other events, among them an Olympic gold medalist, a world weightlifting champion and a maker of "Ri Chol Hon Movement" recognized by the International Gymnastics Federation.
					
					 In 2013 alone it snatched more than 150 gold medals in DPRK Championships and other national games, setting new five national records in weightlifting and track-and-field events.
					
					 The athletes and coaches of the team are now putting spurs to training in order to create new miracles of heroic Korea in international games.

articles.title: DPRK's H-bomb Test Is Entirely Just: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's H-bomb Test Is Entirely Just: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK proudly joined the ranks of nuclear weapons states having H-bomb.
					 The Workers' Party of Korea decided to have access to H-bomb, prompted by its strategic will to defend the destiny of the whole Korean nation and regional peace with a sense of responsibility.
					
					 H-bomb of justice dealt a heavy sledge-hammer at the U.S. and its followers keen to stifle the DPRK and realized the long-cherished desire of the nation to have the most powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The Korean people have more ardent desire for powerful deterrent than any nation.
					
					 Because they have long suffered untold misfortune and pain as the victim of the imperialists' moves for war of aggression. They are still exposed to the threat of the most horrible nuclear war.
					
					 No nation in the world is exposed to such U.S. direct nuclear threat and blackmail for such long period as the Korean people.
					
					 After unleashing the Korean War in June, 1950 the U.S. openly laid bare its plan to drop A-bomb on Korea.
					
					 On Nov. 30, 1950 Truman, the then U.S. president, openly talked about the use of A-bomb on the Korean front and issued an order to the U.S. strategic flying corps to "put bombers on alert to fly to the Far East for prompt drop of A-bombs."
					
					 The number of nuclear weapons deployed by the U.S. in south Korea increased day by day, reaching nearly 1,000 in the 1970s and more than 1,720 in the 1990s.
					
					 It has staged nuclear war drills against the DPRK in south Korea and its vicinity for several decades under various codenames such as Freedom Bolt, Team Spirit, RSOI, Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					 The Obama administration further increased the nuclear threat and blackmail by introducing its nuclear strike means into south Korea including even the nuclear carrier strike group and nuclear strategic flying corps. It thus turned the Korean Peninsula into the world's hottest spot and hotbed of a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. has staged ceaseless drills for nuclear war, persistently sidestepping the DPRK's proposal for defusing the danger of a war and creating a peaceful climate on the peninsula through the replacement of the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty. It is set to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula any time. 
					
					The DPRK has made every effort to shatter the U.S. heinous moves for a nuclear war, ensure peace on the peninsula and regional security and build a prosperous thriving nation.
					
					 It successfully conducted its first H-bomb test, a higher stage in developing nuclear weapons, as a self-defensive measure to cope with the U.S. increasing nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 History teaches immutable truth that a small country and the one exposed to the imperialist forces' direct threat of aggression should exert greater efforts for bolstering its military capability than any others.
					
					 The powerful nuclear deterrent serves as an all-powerful treasured sword for smashing outsiders' moves for aggression, ensuring the country's peace and security and building a thriving nation.
					
					The DPRK's option was entirely just.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hails First Successful H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hails First Successful H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Through its first successful H-bomb test the DPRK has come to possess more powerful military muscle to reliably protect the sovereignty of the nation and peace on the Korean Peninsula from the enemies' challenges for aggression.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The successful H-bomb test is a special event that settled the pent-up grudge of the fellow countrymen and dealt a merciless blow at the Korean nation's sworn enemy, the U.S. imperialists working with bloodshot eyes to launch a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 A powerful nation would be unthinkable apart from strong military muscle in the present world where jungle law is in force. It is a bitter lesson taught by history that powerless justice is bound to be torn to pieces by brutal forces challenging justice.
					
					 The DPRK, holding the treasured sword of justice serving the purposes of peace, prosperity and civilization of mankind, put a definite end to the imperialists' unjust history of nuclear weapons. Gone forever are the tragic days when Koreans were thrown into distress and misfortune overnight after their country with a history spanning 5 000 years lost its sovereignty because of its weak military muscle.
					
					 The Korean nation is no longer a weak nation which used to be in the past when the Koreans could not but stand up with matchlocks against guns of foreign aggressors.
					
					 The imperialists are known to twist the world around their fingers. However, they dare not provoke the DPRK, terming it "most fearful rival". It is towering higher as an invincible power after its successful H-bomb test.

articles.title: Japan's Hideous Unethical Crimes Were Not Committed against S. Korea Only: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japan's Hideous Unethical Crimes Were Not Committed against S. Korea Only: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Late last year the Japanese reactionaries held negotiations with the south Korean authorities over the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and are now noisily advertising that the "issue of comfort women was finally and irreversibly settled" after giving a petty amount of money to them.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Saturday says that the outcome of the recent negotiations held with the Japanese authorities was another insult to the Korean nation and victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army as "the deal was clinched" through the provision of a petty amount of money without getting any honest apology from them or leaving any proper written agreement.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Japan did not commit war crimes and hideous inhuman crimes against south Korea only. The sexual slavery was perpetrated against the whole of Korea. Its victims are still alive in the DPRK and other Asian countries.
					
					 Therefore, it is the common sense that Japan should make a sincere apology and reparation for its crimes to all Koreans and the people of other Asian countries.
					
					 It is illogical and illegal for the Japanese authorities to claim that the issue of the sexual slavery was finally settled by paying a paltry amount of money to victims in south Korea only.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should drop their foolish calculation that they can evade their responsibility for redeeming the past crimes with such sleight of hand.
					
					 The DPRK will legitimately exercise its right as the victim till its damaged national dignity is recovered.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' North-targeted War Maneuvers Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' North-targeted War Maneuvers Flailed
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military forces staged north-targeted war maneuvers in forefront areas and other parts of south Korea on Jan. 1.
					 What should not be overlooked is that the chairman of the joint chiefs of staff and the navy chief of staff of the south Korean army and other military brass hats were busy inspecting forefront areas including Paekryong Island and Kyodong Island like hungry wolves and cried out for taking "prompt and resolute counteraction in case of enemy's provocation," a madcap war drumbeating. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary says this lays bare the vicious nature of the group of traitors watching for a chance to invade the north together with foreign forces, deadest against national reunification and stirring up hostility towards the compatriots in the north.
					
					 These reckless military provocations are an unpardonable challenge to the DPRK's peace-loving efforts, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has gone to extremes in its moves for isolating and stifling the DPRK through military threat and blackmail, unprecedented sanctions and "human rights" racket, and the group of traitors toeing its line is getting more vicious in its moves to ignite a war. Such grave situation proved once again how just the DPRK was when it had access to nuclear deterrent for self-defense and bolstered it up in every way to meet the challenges of hostile forces for aggression.
					
					 We love peace but will not allow those who go reckless to provoke a war against peace.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to properly understand the resolute will of the peace champions and stop acting rashly.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful H-bomb Hailed by Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful H-bomb Hailed by Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) made public a statement on Thursday welcoming the first successful H-bomb test of Juche Korea.
					 The first successful H-bomb test made the DPRK proudly join the advanced ranks of the nuclear weapons states possessed of even H-tomb and the dignity and might of the Korean nation have come to shine more brilliantly on the highest level, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The successful H-bomb test is a self-defensive measure to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and vital rights of the nation and reliably ensure the peace on the Korean Peninsula and regional security from the daily-growing nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 No one can take issue with the DPRK over its access to H-bomb for justice.
					
					 The headquarters fully support the measure taken by the DPRK.

articles.title: Japanese Government's Official Apology and Reparation for Sexual Slavery Demanded by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Japanese Government's Official Apology and Reparation for Sexual Slavery Demanded by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea sent a letter to the UN on Jan. 6 demanding the Japanese government's official admission of its responsibility and apology for the issue of the sexual slavery.
					 The letter disclosed that Japan in the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery reached with south Korea did not refer in detail to the crimes and refused to admit that the crimes were the state-sponsored ones committed by the government in an organized manner and made no promise to own a legal responsibility for them.
					
					 It said that the proper settlement of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army should start from the Japanese government's official and clear admission of its responsibility and apology and it is the principle and common sense to take measures such as its legal reparation, efforts for preventing the repetition of such crime and education in history. It went on:
					
					 This being a hard fact, the Japanese foreign minister claimed that the "funds for the establishment of a foundation by the government are not for reparation" and the Japanese prime minister said he would not make an apology for the issue of the sexual slavery no longer. Their remarks clearly go to prove that the recent "agreement" is not the settlement of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Japan called for pulling down the "statues of girls for peace" depicting the victims of the sexual slavery erected by the unanimous desire of the victims and civilians and the south Korean regime, taking advantage of the former's demand, promised to exercise self-restraint in criticism and censure in the international arena.
					
					 We can never accept the recent "agreement" as it did not reflect the Japanese government's will to implement its state and legal responsibility.
					
					 The letter urged the UN to voice support and pay attention to the actions of victims and progressive and civic and public bodies of the world for proper settlement of the issue of sexual slavery.

articles.title: Projected Revision of Labor Law Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Projected Revision of Labor Law Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "No democracy under Park Geun Hye regime and Saenuri Party" was posted on the south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on Jan. 5. 
					 Chongwadae and the "Saenuri Party" are pressuring the speaker of the "National Assembly" (NA) to railroad the bills quite unfavorable to progressive parties by use of his authority and trying to include labor bill and other evil bills in them, the editorial said.
					
					 The present regime is also busy railroading the evil bills while bringing the heavy burden resulting from the continued economic crisis and deteriorated people's living to the shoulders of the workers, farmers and common people and pushing democracy back, it noted.

articles.title: Japan-S. Korea "Agreement" on Issue of Sexual Slavery Is Null and Void: S. Korean Media
articles.content:
Japan-S. Korea "Agreement" on Issue of Sexual Slavery Is Null and Void: S. Korean Media
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on Jan. 4 protested the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the outcome of the political collusion among the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					 The editorial said that the "agreement" was made according to the U.S. plan, to all intends and purposes. Prior to the talks, the U.S. informed the present regime and the Japanese authorities that the U.S. would make public a statement hailing the "agreement", the editorial noted.
					
					 The "agreement" is a political collusion among the U.S., Japan and south Korea and the second humiliating agreement, it said, and went on:
					
					 The "agreement" without an official apology and legal reparation is null and void.
					
					 The grave crimes committed in the era of Japanese imperialism including the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army should be properly settled.

articles.title: Tajik Party Welcomes DPRK's First Successful H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Tajik Party Welcomes DPRK's First Successful H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan Thursday made public a statement welcoming the DPRK's first successful H-bomb test.
					 It said:
					
					 The DPRK worked such a miracle as succeeding in its first H-bomb test on Jan. 6, 2016.
					
					 This is an event to be specially recorded in the world history, which made the DPRK join with dignity the advanced ranks of the nuclear weapons states and fully demonstrate the stamina of the nation.
					
					 As was clarified in the statement of the DPRK government, the H-bomb test was a measure for self-defense taken to firmly protect the sovereignty of the country and the vital rights of the nation from the daily growing nuclear threat and blackmail by the U.S.-led hostile forces and reliably guarantee peace on the Korean Peninsula and regional security.
					
					 The DPRK's successful H-bomb test was the great deed of history, an event of great national significance reliably guaranteeing the eternal future of the nation.
					
					 Such a great event can be achieved only under the guidance of an outstanding leader.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan fully supports the DPRK's successful H-bomb test.

articles.title: Ugandan and Indian Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Ugandan and Indian Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Ugandan and Indian organizations published statements on January 7 to hail the success of Juche Korea in its first H-bomb test.
					 The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement in a statement said the recent success in the H-bomb test was a great victory of the Songun politics pursued by HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, and the demonstration of its vitality.
					
					 The statement warmly hailed the success of the DPRK in the test of its first H-bomb, a powerful deterrence for safeguarding the sovereignty of the country and warding off the danger of war.
					
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association in a statement said that the success in the H-bomb test would instill greater strength and courage into the Korean people set to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country after having the U.S. forces and nuclear weapons withdrawn from the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement sincerely wished the Korean people holding fast to the new line of simultaneously developing economic construction and the building of nuclear force greater success.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Angolan and Austrian organizations released statements in support of the part dealing with the issue of national reunification in the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples on January 3 said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, calling on all the Korean people in the north, in the south and abroad to pool their efforts to usher in a new era of independent reunification, in his New Year Address advanced an important proposal on resolving the issues of inter-Korean relations and national reunification by the efforts of the Koreans in conformity with their independent will and wishes, true to the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Fully supporting the proposal on national reunification made by him, we express firm solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria on January 4 noted:
					
					 The issue of Korea's reunification should be resolved in an independent and peaceful way in keeping with the will and desire of all Koreans under any circumstances.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should take practical measures for dialogue between the north and the south and improvement of the relations and give up the daydream of solving the issue of Korea's reunification with the help of foreign forces.
					
					 The U.S. should unconditionally accept the fair and aboveboard proposal of the DPRK for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that all Koreans will frustrate the challenges and obstructive moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and surely build a reunified and prosperous country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Russian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers posted special write-ups interwoven with articles praising the exploits and greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un on their websites.
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda on December 10 last year devoted a whole page to an article titled "Characteristic feature of Kim Jong Un's politics" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 It stressed that the characteristic feature of his politics is that he is pursuing the politics shaped on the basis of philosophical thought, one unshakable in decision and firm in faith and unpredictably mysterious one, and cited facts to prove them.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The world came to properly know the caliber of the DPRK's leader who has consolidated the political system, carried on defence upbuilding and economic construction, etc. dealing with the U.S. with his pluck. Now one can predict the future of the era of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Khabarovsk Express on December 24 last year said in an article that the ceaseless field guidance given by Kim Jong Un to different parts of the country is drawing the attention of world media.
					
					 It noted that what impresses people, in particular, is his special loving care for the younger generation.
					
					 The Eastern Siberian Publishing House in Irkutsk Region posted on its website on December 22 last year an article on his wise leadership over the construction of the scientists streets in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in UK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in UK
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- There was a briefing on the New Year Address of supreme leader Kim Jong Un in London on January 2 and 3.
					 Present there were personages of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), New Communist Party of Britain, Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy.
					
					 The briefing on the gist of the address was followed by speeches.
					
					 Christopher Coleman, national leader of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), said the world public once again realized that Kim Jong Un is, indeed, the great leader of practician type who surely does whatever he is determined to do, fully supporting his New Year Address.
					
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the party, said the world knows no such leader as Kim Jong Un who reviewed the last year's work and explicitly set forth the goals to be attained in the new year.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, fully supported the idea of national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un and expressed his will to positively conduct a campaign against the moves of the U.S. imperialists to ignite a new war.
					
					 Keith Bennett, vice-chairman of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and representative of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), said the high international prestige of Kim Jong Un can be well understood by the fact that his New Year Address was widely reported by world media.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars and lectures on the New Year Address of supreme leader Kim Jong Un took place in Switzerland, Ukraine and Romania from January 2 to 4.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, and other persons said the New Year Address serves as important guidelines that indicated the way for the Korean people to register bigger successes in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is to be held.
					
					 They expressed their will to positively support the just struggle of the Korean people for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said the Seventh Congress of the WPK to be held in the DPRK will be the one of victors.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, read out the address and said the address is an important work that indicated the road to be covered by the world progressives opposed to the imperialists.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassy in Kinshasa
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassy in Kinshasa
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of DR Congo led by General Secretary Boswa Isekombe Sylvere and Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo visited the DPRK embassy in Kinshasa on Dec. 30 and 31 last year on the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 They paid tribute to a painting depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 The general secretary of the Communist Party of DR Congo expressed belief that the Korean people would register bigger successes in the new year, too, as they worked world-startling miracles last year under the energetic leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo expressed conviction that the brave Korean people would perform fresh miracles and innovations, true to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Un in the new year, too.

articles.title: DPRK's H-bomb Test Hailed by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's H-bomb Test Hailed by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- H-bomb test is an event of worldwide significance as it demonstrated the invincible strength, resolution and combat capability of socialist Korea, said the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on Jan. 6.
					 The DPRK succeeded in its first H-bomb test, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK developed H-bomb by its indigenous efforts and technology.
					
					 It succeeded in H-bomb test most perfectly, proudly joining the advanced ranks of nuclear weapons states possessed of even H-bomb.
					
					 The DPRK, a peace-loving state and responsible nuclear weapons state, will not be the first to use nuclear weapons and transfer relevant means and technology under any circumstances. This is the principled stand of the DPRK.
					
					 H-bomb test signifies a great victory of the Songun politics pursued by Marshal Kim Jong Un and the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: DPRK's Stance Supported by Brazilian Paper
articles.content:
DPRK's Stance Supported by Brazilian Paper
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian paper Patria Latina Wednesday carried an article titled "DPRK's H-bomb test and West's hypocritical response" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					 Noting the West is hypocritically responding to the H-bomb test of the DPRK, the article said:
					
					 Having a lot of nuclear weapons, Israel is never bound to any resolution of the UN.
					
					 The IAEA is not entitled to take issue with the nuclear weapons and tests of Israel and no world media have ever censured them.
					
					 But they have termed nuclear tests of the countries standing up against the U.S. "threats".
					
					 The government of the DPRK is steadily advancing, exercising its legitimate right to make special weapons to protect itself from the attack of the hostile forces.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin conjunto de militares y civiles de ciudad de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin conjunto de militares y civiles de ciudad de Pyongyang 
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 el mitin conjunto de los militares y civiles de la ciudad de Pyongyang para celebrar el exito de la primera prueba de bomba de hidrogeno de la Corea del Juche. 
					Estaban repletos de ciudadanos la Plaza Kim Il Sung, las explanadas del Monumento a la Idea Juche, el Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril, el Arco de Triunfo, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y otros lugares de esta capital. 
					
					Asistieron alli Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos, asi como el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los compatriotas de visita en la patria. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los agregados militares, acreditados en la RPDC, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					El miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Pak Pong Ju, dio lectura a la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC referente al exito completo de la primera prueba de bomba-H de la Corea de Juche. 
					
					Y pronunciaron discursos de felicitacion el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, No Kwang Chol, el presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, y el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jang Chol. 
					
					El secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam dijo que el 6 de enero de 2016 en que se realizo con exito la primera prueba de bomba de hidrogeno es el dia de acontecimiento historico que manifesto a todo el mundo la dignidad de la potencia Paektusan mas grandiosa y poderosa en el mundo. 
					
					El primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, No Kwang Chol, senalo que gracias a la direccion del Comandante Supremo por el desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas pudieron contar con el poderoso disuasivo nuclear capaz de atacar en cualquier punto de nuestro planeta a todas las fuerzas que se atrevan a infringir la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion coreana. 
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, dijo que a traves del presente evento que estremecio todo el mundo, los jovenes coreanos pudieron conocer de nuevo el poderio inagotable de la Corea del Juche guiada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un y guardaron en lo mas profundo del corazon la conviccion de que es definitiva la victoria final si marchan por la orbita de la revolucion coreana fijada por el PTC. 
					
					El presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jang Chol, apunto que el exito de la prueba de bomba de hidrogeno es el resultado de la ardiente fidelidad al PTC, abnegacion patriotica y capacidad creativa de los cientificos y tecnicos del sector de defensa nacional. 
					
					Terminado el mitin, se realizaron los bailes festivos de los jovenes, estudiantes y trabajadores y se tiraron salvas artificiales.

articles.title: Coreanos agradecen a PTC
articles.content:
Coreanos agradecen a PTC
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- Informados de la exitosa prueba de la primera bomba H, todos los militares y civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea testimonian su gratitud al Partido del Trabajo de Corea que trajo otra gran victoria y expresan la fe en la victoria final.
					Jo Yong Dok, director de departamento del Consejo de Ministros, dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					La exitosa prueba de la bomba H, ejecutada segun la determinacion estrategica del PTC, deviene un historico evento conmovedor que declaro a todo el mundo la voluntad de Corea del Songun de aniquilar a cualesquier enemigos fuertes sin dejar ni un tipejo que pueda firmar la nota de rendimiento.
					
					Ahora, veo el radiante futuro de la prosperidad de la nacion.
					
					Juro renovar decisivamente este ano la operacion y mando economicos para convertir las reclamaciones de hoy en los vitores de la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Pho Hui Song, gerente de la Mina Carbonifera Juventud 8 de Febrero de Jikdong, subrayo: 
					
					El pleno exito de la prueba de bomba H es la solemne declaracion de Corea del Songun de defender firmemente la dignidad nacional. Y ademas deviene un castigo severo a la horda de bandidos.
					
					Estoy orgulloso de vivir en la invencible potencia militar y redoblo mas la conviccion sobre la victoria final.
					
					Los obreros carboniferos dedicaran toda su inteligencia, sudor y pasion para el incremento de la produccion hullera.
					
					Paek On, jefe de la junta administrativa de la granja cooperativa de Naejung del distrito de Yomju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, asevero:
					
					Agradezco al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien con el poderoso disuasivo nuclear defiende fidedignamente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y region y presenta la nacion coreana como la mas fuerte.
					
					Con la responsabilidad de defender la primera trinchera del primer destacamento de la batalla de defensa socialista, solucionaremos a toda costa el problema de alimentos en este ano en que se convocara el Septimo Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: CC de PTC envia mensaje de felicitacion a Megawati Soekarnoputri
articles.content:
CC de PTC envia mensaje de felicitacion a Megawati Soekarnoputri
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 9 un mensaje de felicitacion a Megawati Soekarnoputri, presidenta general del Consejo de Direccion Central del Partido Democratico de Lucha de Indonesia, con motivo del 43o aniversario de la fundacion de esta organizacion politica.
					La misiva expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre el PTC y PDLI continuaran desarrollandose favorablemente tambien en el futuro y desea de todo corazon al destinatario buena salud y mayores exitos en sus labores para el fortalecimiento y desarrollo del partido.

articles.title: Entidad surcoreana demanda oficial reconocimiento y disculpa de Japon
articles.content:
Entidad surcoreana demanda oficial reconocimiento y disculpa de Japon
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- El Consejo por la Solucion del Problema de las Tropas de Voluntarias del Sur de Corea emitio el dia 6 un mensaje a la ONU demandando el oficial reconocimiento de la responsabilidad y la disculpa del gobierno japones sobre el problema de la esclavitud sexual. 
					  La misiva senala que en el "acuerdo" alusivo al problema de esclavitud sexual aprobado junto con el Sur de Corea, Japon no refirio en detalles a los crimenes, ni reconocio el hecho de que eso fue crimen estatal cometido de manera organizativa por el gobierno, ni dio ninguna promesa de aceptarlo como responsabilidad legal y ejecutarlo, y prosigue:
					
					  La correcta resolucion del problema arriba mencionado se inicia desde el oficial y claro reconocimiento de la responsabilidad y la disculpa del gobierno japones, y la indemnizacion legal, los esfuerzos por prevenir el recrudecimiento, la educacion de historia y otras medidas correspondientes devienen el principio y el conocimiento elemental.
					
					  Sin embargo el canciller japones confirmo que "no es la 'indemnizacion' el dinero que se ofrece por el gobierno al establecimiento de la fundacion" y el premier tambien disparateo que no hara mas disculpa en cuanto al problema de la esclavitud sexual, lo cual comprueba que el presente "acuerdo" no es la solucion sobre el problema de la esclavitud sexual del ex ejercito japones.
					
					  Ademas Japon demando el traslado de la "estatua de nina de paz" construida por la unanime aspiracion de las danadas de la esclavitud sexual y los ciudadanos y, en adhesion de esto, el actual "gobierno" surcoreano se comprometio a abstenerse de la critica y la censura en la sociedad internacional.
					
					  No podemos aceptar nunca el presente "acuerdo" que no refleja la ejecucion de la responsabilidad estatal y legal del gobierno japones.
					
					  Actualmente, las danadas, progresistas entidades civiles y sociales del mundo y ciudadanos desarrollan las actividades en demanda de la resolucion correcta del problema arriba referido, senalo la misiva y pidio a la ONU prestar el apoyo y atencion a dichos actos.
